text:
Love the centre setup & ambience. Comfy, cool & great place for kids.
Centre principal Ms Katerin was friendly & welcoming. Staffs are very nice too. Overall a great experience!
The Open house experience was very welcoming by the hosts. Environment certainly feels clean, new and conducive.
We like the center very much, it feel comfy and easy for the kids to access the facilities. We like it has the vegetarian option as well, and the programmes being offered.

Wowww!! I have been waiting for this centre to open! Itâ€™s most convenient to my house so I can send my two boys to class on my way to work! There is so much facility and I believe my sons will grow and learn in this place! A-star!
Small and cozy place. Great curriculum and convenience.
